content: here s a cozy beginner-friendly hat pattern that s perfect for knitting gifts for loved ones knit in the round with worsted weight yarn this beanie features a 2x2 ribbed brim and an optional simple stitch pattern on the body to keep things easy it transitions to stockinette stitch before the crown shaping the stitch pattern includes both written-out and charted instructions and has been both tech edited and test knit it s a great way to practice knitting in the round and chart reading one skein of worsted weight yarn will make the child adult small/medium or adult large size you ll want 16 40 cm circular needles and double-points in a size to get gauge or you can use one long circular and the magic loop method this pattern has been test knit and professionally tech edited
